actions.name: Zen Mode

cost.trigger: Trigger: An attack is resolved against the user and the user meets the [Desperation 1/2] Condition.

actions.description:
Trigger: An attack is resolved against the user and the user meets the [Desperation 1/2] Condition.

Effect: The user changes to its Zen Forme.

actions.name: Zen Mode
actions.description:
Effect: While in Standard Forme, the user deals 15% more damage, and in Zen Forme, they take 15% less damage. Depending on the user's Species, they also gain an Extra Ability:

  • Darmanitan Standard Forme - Sheer Force
  • Darmanitan Zen Forme - Power Fists
  • Galarian Darmanitan Standard Forme: Gorilla Tactics
  • Galarian Darmanitan Zen Mode: Coldflame

actions.name: Zen Mode
actions.description: Effect: The user changes to or from its Zen Forme.
